__e: Miss Tracy, Daktari, it is not within our hearts to destroy any living thing without cause.
One look at the creature she has become will turn any living thing to stone.
I was two animals joined as one... which meant good things are coming.
So from now on the only living creatures to be in this room are human beings.
To all the creatures within us!
People or creatures that think like us, that see the world in the same way as us.
We are talking about every critter in the world, right?
There's only one creature in Earthsea capable of such evil.
It can see the pain of mankind through its eyes,
Hobbes believes the man is an animal that thinks too much ...an over rational animal that has lost touch with his body and his instincts
He was the only one who understood that it's a living creature, however small it may be.
Yes. An animal is always at its best when hunted.
